title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: A Literature Review for Student-Driven and Technology-Enhanced Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using fundamental digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can set their own goals during the learning process and establish self-directed implementation plans using technological tools
Learners can strengthen learning ownership through peer feedback and resource sharing using digital platforms (e.g., LMS, collaboration tools)
Learners can improve learning outcomes by applying self-regulated learning strategies (e.g., time management, reflective journaling) in technology-based learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
